sub_title: 25+ Years’ experience driving large International Sales Teams structuring, winning multi-million-dollar complex deals, Telco Industry | Business Operations Analysis | Deal Structuring | Contract Negotiation
summary:
I have 25+ years’ experience in winning multi-million dollar deals in the Telecom sector.

I have a proven track record of consistently winning new customers and expanding business with our existing customers resulting in a total sales volume of 500+ million Euro. 

My work included Solution and Services Sales, Business Development, Bid Team Management, Contract Negotiations, Contract Management, Customer Relationship Management and Team Leadership.

I have lived and worked in an international environment covering Europe, Southeast Asia, China, India, Middle East and Africa. I have successfully led multi-cultural teams in these regions and had the privilege to live and work in the Netherlands, Hong Kong, Singapore and Kenya. This international experience has truly enriched my life.

I am a result driven team player that thrives in multi-disciplinary teams with members from different backgrounds, complementing each other and maximizing each other’s strengths. 

My key strength is structuring complex services deals that are attractive for the customer, while at the same time safeguarding profitability and minimizing technical and commercial risks, by using a fact-based and analytical approach in all phases of the sales process. 

During the last 15 years, I have worked in several sales roles in Managed Services at Nokia. 
Before that I worked in other areas of the Telecommunications industry including software development, product and system marketing management, general management, partner management and sales support.

I hold an MSc degree in Electrical Engineering and successfully passed the post academic course for Business Administration at Eindhoven University of Technology.

I am fluent in English, moderately skilled in German and French, and my native language is Dutch.

In my spare time, I enjoy field hockey, golf, skiing, snowboarding, sailing, scuba diving, traveling and hiking.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for Sales and Business Development in the Telco and Tech segment, EMEA region.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Account Executive Telco & Tech

profile_positions.description:
As Engagement Manager, Managed Services Middle East and Africa (MEA) I was responsible for selling Managed Services. Managed Services scope for Telecom Operators typically includes Network Operations Center Services, Field Services and Network Optimization Services. 

I successfully managed up to one-year sales cycles resulting in profitable Managed Services/Outsourcing deals with Telecom Operators in the Middle East and Africa. 

My work included customer engagement, bid management, solution development, offering business case development, pricing, commercial and technical negotiations, handover to delivery team, as well as contract management. 

In this role I worked on many multi-country/multi-year/multi-million USD frame contracts for various pan-African operators, including one of the top-four Managed Services accounts for Nokia. 

In 2015 my team received the Nokia “Global service award for Innovation and Growth”
profile_positions.title: Engagement Manager Managed Services Middle East and Africa (MEA)

profile_positions.description:
I was already working as Engagement Manager Managed Services for Middle East and Africa based in Singapore. 

I successfully developed business with new target customers in Saudi Arabia, ultimately resulting in multi-million USD Managed Services deals with two of the major mobile operators in Saudi Arabia. This laid the foundation of the current Nokia Managed Services business in Saudi Arabia.

My success in this role led to me being invited to move to Kenya to develop the rapidly growing Managed Services business in Africa.
profile_positions.title: Engagement Manager Managed Services Middle East and Africa (MEA)

profile_positions.description:
As Business Architect Managed Services I was responsible for the offering business cases, pricing, scenario analysis and risk analysis for Managed Services sales cases. I typically worked on the bigger and more complicated cases that resulted in several multi-year Managed Services contracts in the India market.

I was a key contributor to the development and successful launch of the Managed Services Business Case Tool to be used by the Managed Services sales teams within Nokia.

I was also responsible for competence transfer to the China Managed Services sales team.
profile_positions.title: Business Architect Managed Services Asia Pacific (APAC), China

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for solutioning and scoping of Managed Services projects, including full business case responsibility with focus on the India market. Member of the contract negotiation team.

Main achievements: Managed Services contracts in the India market with three mobile operators.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Manager Managed Services Asia Pacific (APAC)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for selling Nokia’s Core and Value Added Service (VAS) platforms to operators in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan market.

Main achievements: retention and expansion of existing VAS platform business.
profile_positions.title: Head of Mobile Services

profile_positions.description: Responsible for selling, developing, and delivering End-User Services consultancy modules to operators in Europe. Areas covered: marketing support, application creation and sourcing, service usability.
profile_positions.title: Consultant End-User Services Consulting

profile_positions.description: Responsible for selection and acquisition of Application & Content partners for Nokia Value Added Services platforms in Northwest Europe (NWE) area in co-operation with Nokia Mobile Phones. Member of Mobile Software Integration (MSI) NWE management team. Match making between operators and Application & Content partners.
profile_positions.title: Partner Manager Mobile Software Integration

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for successfully expanding and managing a highly motivated and successful team of Product and System Marketing Managers providing technical sales support for fixed network and mobile network accounts in Northwest Europe (NWE) area.

Member of the Management Team of Nokia Networks Netherlands.

Main achievements of my team: new supply contracts with two mobile operators in The Netherlands, establishing GPRS market share lead in Netherlands and Belgium, ADSL market entry in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Sales Support Center Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for supporting the Customer Teams with marketing and technical sales of cable telephony systems, narrowband and broadband access systems, and transmission systems in various European countries.

Main achievements: fixed access system supply contracts with various operators, as well as business development for ADSL which laid the foundation for several ADSL supply contracts in Europe.
profile_positions.title: System Marketing Manager Fixed Access Systems

profile_positions.description: Responsible for marketing and sales of Interactive Video Systems and Fixed Access Systems for Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) region together with Interactive Digital Solutions (Joint Venture between AT&T Network Systems and Silicon Graphics Inc.).
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager Interactive Video Networks

profile_positions.description: Responsible for offering business cases for 5ESS (digital switching system) sales cases and new feature development for Netherlands and Spain market. Support for long range planning and mid/long term strategy definition for assigned accounts.
profile_positions.title: Business Marketing Manager Switching

profile_positions.description: Responsible for developing diagnostics software for new hardware introductions for 5ESS. Temporary assignment to improve quality of 5ESS user documentation and to eliminate documentation backlog where I had a significant contribution to user documentation development process definition and implementation.
profile_positions.title: HW Diagnostics Software Developer Switching

volunteer_experiences.description: ZOAT (Zuidoost Azië Toernooi) is an annual field hockey tournament organized by and for the Dutch hockey community living and working in the Asia Pacific region. The tournament circulates between Singapore, Hong Kong, Jakarta, Bangkok, and Kuala Lumpur and has a history of more than 45 years.
Tutoring high school students in mathematics, physics, and chemistry. All my students succesfully passed their exams.

E.t.s.v. THOR (Electrotechnical Study Association THOR) organizes all kinds of activities focused on the enrichment of the students of Electrical Engineering at Eindhoven University of Technology like, among others, excursions to companies both in The Netherlands and abroad, lectures and workshops.
